channel.title: reflection on Kuldeep Singh
channel.description: Recent content in reflection on Kuldeep Singh

item.title: Two Thoughtful Years!
item.description: Itâ€™s now two years since I accepted a challenging change to leave the previous organization after 13 long years, and join ThoughtWorks. Any change requires sacrifices and dedication before it becomes a positive change, but the journey becomes easy when we believe in the change and accept it. A change introduces us to a new environment and enables new thoughts, and new energy. The two years journey at ThoughtWorks is no different.
